I hope this email finds you well.

 

Could you please try logging in from this url : https://freepoint.dnext.io/ <https://freepoint.dnext.io/>

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Could you please try logging in from this url : https://freepoint.dnext.io/

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah
